\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal L} =
 M_{\rm Pl}^2 h \square h + 
M_{\rm Pl}^2 m^2_g ( A \square A + h \square \phi ) +
\cdots 
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal L}_{\rm F P} &=& [h^2] - [h]^2 \nonumber \\
&\leadsto&
[( A + A^T + A^T A )^2] - ( 2 [A] + [A A^T])^2 \nonumber \\
&=& 2[A A^T]+2[A A^T]-4[A]^2 + 4 [A^2 A^T] - 4 [A] [A A^T] + [A^T A A^T A] - 
[A A^T]^2 \quad \quad \label{l2int}
\

\begin{eqnarray}
{\cal L} &=& M_{\rm Pl}^2 \sqrt{G_0} \{R ( G_0 ) e^r + 
( V_{\mu , \nu} - V_{\nu , \mu} )^2 \} +\cdots \\
&=& M_{\rm Pl}^2 G^0 \square G^0 + M_{\rm Pl}^2 r \square G^0 
+ M_{\rm Pl}^2 ( V_{\mu , \nu} - V_{\nu , \mu} )^2 +\cdots \nonumber
\

\begin{eqnarray}
\delta 
\sqrt{g}(\partial_z\psi)^2 g^{zz}  =
(j+m+n+c+d) 
\delta(j+m+n+c+d)
m n  \sqrt{g}^{j} \psi^m \psi^n g^{zz(c)}\epsilon^{d}
\
